utils module¶

utils.create_output_path(outpath: str)[source]¶

Creates any non-existent folder(s) in the outpath

Parameters

outpath (str) – Path to a file or directory

utils.get_file_extension(filepath: str) → str[source]¶

Gets the extension from a filepath.

Parameters

filepath (str) – Path to the file

Returns

The file’s extension (e.g. ‘.txt’)

Return type

str

utils.parse_indexes(indexes_list: list = []) → list[source]¶

Parses mixed list of integers and ranges from CLI into a discret list of integers.

Parameters

indexes_list (list, optional) – List of strings of mixed ints and/or ranges (e.g. [‘1’, ‘2’, ‘5-7’, ‘10-15’]). Defaults to [].

Returns

Discret list of unique integers

Return type

list

utils.remove_softmax_activation(model_path: str, save_path: str = '') → tensorflow.python.keras.engine.training.Model[source]¶

Prepares a classifier with softmax activation for verification by removing the softmax activation function from the output layer.

Parameters

  • model_path (str) – Path to model

  • save_path (str, optional) – Path where new model is saved. Defaults to ‘’.

Returns

The modified tensorflow Model object

Return type

tf.keras.Model

utils.set_df_dtypes(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, dtypes: dict) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Sets datatypes for specified columns of DataFrame

Parameters

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – The DataFrame

  • dtypes (dict) – Dictionary of datatypes (e.g. {‘col’:type, …})

Returns

The updated DataFrame

Return type

pd.DataFrame

utils.softargmax(y: numpy.array) → numpy.array[source]¶

Applies softmax & argmax to emulate the softmax output layer of a tensorflow model

Parameters

y (np.array) – Logits layer output

Returns

onehot encoded prediction (e.g. [0,0,1,0])

Return type

np.array
